quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因“bull”（公牛）的字面意思，将“bull shark”错误理解为“公牛形状的鲨鱼”或“以公牛为食的鲨鱼”，而非正确的鲨鱼品种。
quiz_item.sentence: The **bull shark** is often spotted in rivers and lakes as well as oceans, showing its remarkable ability to adapt to different water environments.

option.definition: 牛鲨（一种能适应不同水域环境的鲨鱼品种）
带有鸟喙的鲨鱼（因“bull”与“bill”（鸟喙）形近混淆）
